content:
alexcrichton opened PR #10728 from alexcrichton:skip-threads-test-on-asan to bytecodealliance:main:

It's expected that this has memory leaks, there's no clean shutdown in the CLI right now.

  • Explain why this change is needed. If the details are in an issue already,
    this can be brief.

alexcrichton requested dicej for a review on PR #10728.
